channel.title: CVE Feed for bPlugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bPlugins -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-23508|2024-01-31T15:21:17.373Z -- bPlugins -- PDF Poster – PDF Embedder Plugin for WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins PDF Poster – PDF Embedder Plugin for WordPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects PDF Poster – PDF Embedder Plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 2.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-30438|2024-03-29T17:20:33.372Z -- bPlugins -- Print Page block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins Print Page block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Print Page block: from n/a through 1.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30432|2024-03-29T17:31:15.099Z -- bPlugins -- B Slider - Slider for your block editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins B Slider - Slider for your block editor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects B Slider - Slider for your block editor: from n/a through 1.1.12.
